raw_data.headquarters: Sanlam Tower, 15th Floor, Off Waiyaki Way, Westlands, P.O. Box 10493-00100, Nairobi, Kenya
raw_data.digital_presence_api_notes: Partner integrations available; self-service portal for policy management
raw_data.reputation_claims_settlement_ratio: Consistent performance with claim payment ratios improving to 9.40% in Q2 2025; underwriting losses noted in H1 2025 due to rising claims (Ksh294.9B sector-wide)
raw_data.reputation_customer_complaints: Limited public details; some delays in claims processing reported on X and reviews; overall positive for affordability and innovation
raw_data.reputation_customer_rating: Mixed feedback; praised for flexible products but criticized for delays in complex claims and communication
raw_data.reputation_notes: Subsidiary of Sanlam Group; ranked among top performers for claims consistency in 2025 rankings. X posts highlight rising costs impacting sector, including Sanlam.

text: Sanlam Kenya Plc is a composite (life, general, pensions, savings) company licensed by Insurance Regulatory Authority (IRA) Kenya under reference IRA/14/005/2025. Headquarters: Sanlam Tower, 15th Floor, Off Waiyaki Way, Westlands, P.O. Box 10493-00100, Nairobi, Kenya. Website: https://www.sanlam.co.ke. Customer rating: Mixed feedback; praised for flexible products but criticized for delays in complex claims and communication, Claims settlement ratio: Consistent performance with claim payment ratios improving to 9.40% in Q2 2025; underwriting losses noted in H1 2025 due to rising claims (Ksh294.9B sector-wide).

raw_data.target_market: individuals seeking flexible savings with life cover
raw_data.eligibility_notes: Flexible contributions; no medical exam for basic cover

customer_reviews.comment: Innovative flexible savings with quick access; partnered with mTek for paperless ecosystem (2022, ongoing)

text: Flexi Hela (ID: sanlam_flexi_hela_001) is a life / savings product by sanlam_001 for individuals seeking flexible savings with life cover. Geographic coverage: Kenya.
Exclusions for Flexi Hela (ID: sanlam_flexi_hela_001): ['Early withdrawal penalties', 'Non-disclosure of health'].
Add-ons for Flexi Hela (ID: sanlam_flexi_hela_001): ['Increased life cover'].
Nawiri (ID: sanlam_nawiri_002) is a life / endowment product by sanlam_001 for individuals for savings and investment. Geographic coverage: Kenya.
Exclusions for Nawiri (ID: sanlam_nawiri_002): ['Early surrender penalties'].

raw_data.eligibility_notes: Covers extended family including unborn/newborn, parents, grandparents; no medical exam; transferable after 50 before 65

text: Family Finance Plan (FFP) (ID: sanlam_ffp_005) is a life / protection product by sanlam_001 for families for burial cover. Geographic coverage: Kenya.

exclusions: Initial 6-12 month waiting (accidental death only); no benefits if withdrawn in year 1; penalties for early withdrawal (25% year 2, 12.5% year 3); HIV/AIDS exclusion waived after waiting

text: Exclusions for Family Finance Plan (FFP) (ID: sanlam_ffp_005): ['Initial 6-12 month waiting (accidental death only); no benefits if withdrawn in year 1; penalties for early withdrawal (25% year 2, 12.5% year 3); HIV/AIDS exclusion waived after waiting'].
Add-ons for Family Finance Plan (FFP) (ID: sanlam_ffp_005): ['Cash bonus savings plan'].
